Read GHRSST

SST in Kelvin

readghrsst(date, time.resolution = c("daily"), xylim = NULL,
  lon180 = TRUE, varname = c("analysed_sst", "analysis_error", "mask",
  "sea_ice_fraction"), setNA = TRUE, latest = FALSE, returnfiles = FALSE,
  ..., inputfiles = NULL)

Arguments

date

datetime
time.resolution

daily
xylim

spatial extents to crop from source data, can be anything accepted by extent
lon180

currently ignored
varname

one of "analysed_sst", "analysis_error", "mask", "sea_ice_fraction"
setNA

ignored
latest

return latest available data
returnfiles

return the files
...

pass in filename to writeRaster
inputfiles

input the file set

Value

RasterStack or RasterLayer

Contents

  • Arguments
  • Value
